mapper.sql: u.userId userId , u.adId adId , u.mail mail , u.fullName fullName , rg.roleGroupName roleGroupName
FROM T_USER u LEFT OUTER JOIN T_USERROLEGROUP urg on (urg.userId=u.userId) LEFT OUTER JOIN T_ROLEGROUP rg on (rg.roleGroupId=urg.roleGroupId)
mapper.select: SELECT r.roleName roleName FROM T_USERROLEGROUP urg JOIN T_ROLEGROUP rg ON (rg.roleGroupId=urg.roleGroupId) JOIN T_ROLEGROUPROLE rgr ON (rgr.roleGroupId=rg.roleGroupId) JOIN T_ROLE r ON (r.roleId=rgr.roleId) WHERE urg.userId=#{employeeId}

select d.division_id divisionId from T_DIVISION d WHERE d.lLV1ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV2ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV3ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV4ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId}) OR d.lLV5ID IN (SELECT division_id FROM T_DIVISION WHERE manager_id=#{employeeId})
